channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K2FBXPWVCJSCNWBAYMATJ0EX
item.description:
So I tried #OpenAI OSS-GPT-20B on Ollama app on Windows 11 Pro running on my Beelink SER5 5560U Mini PC with 6C 12T CPU and 32GB of RAM, and it crawls like next to unusable. It seems you need a beefier rig than that – so much more than the average household computer.

#OSSGPT20B
item.content:encoded:
So I tried #OpenAI OSS-GPT-20B on Ollama app on Windows 11 Pro running on my Beelink SER5 5560U Mini PC with 6C 12T CPU and 32GB of RAM, and it crawls like next to unusable. It seems you need a beefier rig than that – so much more than the average household computer.

#OSSGPT20B

item.title: Vanilla Cookbook
item.description:
Vanilla Cookbook

Vanilla Cookbook is a self hosted recipe manager built with Svelte(kit). It is designed with complexity under the hood, keeping the user experience as uncluttered, simply vanilla as possible.

Most of the web’s recipes are stored as text, without much thought to a consistent language or structure. Many self-hosted apps go down the structuring route, automating, or asking the user to organise their data. This can lead to cluttered and complex interfaces, limiting user experiences to those technically minded. The philosophy behind Vanilla was to do as much as I could with that text as it was, limiting the work the user has to do to a minimum. You should be able to get cooking with a few clicks.
item.content:encoded:
Vanilla Cookbook

Vanilla Cookbook is a self hosted recipe manager built with Svelte(kit). It is designed with complexity under the hood, keeping the user experience as uncluttered, simply vanilla as possible.

Most of the web’s recipes are stored as text, without much thought to a consistent language or structure. Many self-hosted apps go down the structuring route, automating, or asking the user to organise their data. This can lead to cluttered and complex interfaces, limiting user experiences to those technically minded. The philosophy behind Vanilla was to do as much as I could with that text as it was, limiting the work the user has to do to a minimum. You should be able to get cooking with a few clicks.

Could this be a lightweight Mealie alternative?

item.title: Nevu - UI alternative to Plex
item.description:
Nevu - UI alternative to Plex

Nevu is a complete redesign of Plex’s UI using the plex media server API.

item.title: Finetic Jellyfin Client
item.description:
Finetic Jellyfin Client

A Modern Jellyfin Client built w/ Next.js.
Time to revisit my preference of Plex over Jellyfin then?

item.title: GoToSocial - ready for Prime Time?
item.description:
GoToSocial - ready for Prime Time?

Short answer: Hell yes.

After completing the full migration and running in production for weeks, I can confidently say GoToSocial is ready for serious use.

Perfect For: ✅

  • Self-hosters with limited resources (VPS with 1-2GB RAM? No problem!)
  • Single-user or small family instances (works great up to ~50 users based on

item.title: Open Notebook
item.description:
Open Notebook

An open source, privacy-focused alternative to Google’s Notebook LM. Why give Google more of our data when we can take control of our own research workflows?
item.content:encoded:
Open Notebook

An open source, privacy-focused alternative to Google’s Notebook LM. Why give Google more of our data when we can take control of our own research workflows?

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01K1XG8R3R9GB0T1VAD3R37YYA
